about_the_game:
The game is about a mice living in a Kingdom far away where some citizens of the Kingdom stepped into a web of intrigue against the Queen. Once Noser and his aunt come to the Kingdom looking for a job. Noser's adventure starts from this moment.


Gameplay:
Noserland is a cartoon adventure-fighting game with a simple to learn interface for kids and not only for them. During passing levels of the game a player enjoys the third person view. Also, there is a help arrow that can be called at any moment of the game. As a result of that a player does not get lost and this makes easy to discover the Noserland world. Noser does not kill his opponents. When a mob loses a fight he just runs away. Also, when a player punishes the main boss a player gets an access to bonus levels. Also, during the game a player has the opportunity to collect game coins and spend them in the village shop.

Features:
- no blood content
- no killing, only punishing
- classic fighting view
- simple interface
- additional levels with bosses

name: NoserLand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP Service Pack 2 or higher (DirectX 9.0c or higher must be installed).
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 screen resolution
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
